head.title: Specify Data Dictionary — Specify Software Project

meta.content: The document contains a complete list of all Specify's data tables and fields. It is intended as a technical reference. It can also be helpful, however, in understanding the scope and usage of certain attributes. When you have a question like "where does this information fit in", reading the attribute description of related attributes may help.
meta.name: description

meta.content: The document contains a complete list of all Specify's data tables and fields. It is intended as a technical reference. It can also be helpful, however, in understanding the scope and usage of certain attributes. When you have a question like "where does this information fit in", reading the attribute description of related attributes may help.
meta.name: DC.description

div.div:
You are here: Home »
What is Specify? »
Data Dictionary

a.title: Information about the various facets of the Specify application.
A description of the hardware and software necessary to run Specify most effectively.
Specify's user manual, available in Windows Help File (CHM) format.
Description of the Specify DiGIR Provider Interface.
A selection of Windows data forms from Specify institutions.
A selection of report formats created by Specify clients.
Here you will find information about events that the Specify team has and will attend. If you are going to be at the same event, come by and say hello! We would love to talk to you!
Specify Software Project staff and contacts.
Cool Features in Specify You May Not Know About.

div.div: The document contains a complete list of all Specify's data tables and fields. It is intended as a technical reference. It can also be helpful, however, in understanding the scope and usage of certain attributes. When you have a question like "where does this information fit in", reading the attribute description of related attributes may help.

div.p: This document is about 56 printed pages and was generated by the Diversity Model Documenter (v1.7) available under a GNU General Public License (v2) from Dr. Gregor Hagedorn, Federal Biological Research Center for Agriculture and Forestry, Berlin, Germany. We gratefully acknowledge the use of his software.

Accession,
AccessionAgents,
AccessionAuthorizations, Address, Agent, AgentAddress, Authors,
BiologicalObjectAttributes,
BiologicalObjectRelation,
BiologicalObjectRelationType, Borrow, BorrowAgents,
BorrowMaterial,
BorrowReturnMaterial,
BorrowShipments, CatalogSeries,
CatalogSeriesDefinition,
CollectingEvent, Collection,
CollectionObject,
CollectionObjectCatalog,
CollectionObjectCitation,
CollectionObjectType,
CollectionTaxonomyTypes, Collectors, DATAVIEWS, Deaccession,
DeaccessionAgents,
DeaccessionCollectionObject, Determination,
DeterminationCitation, ExchangeIn, ExchangeOut, Geography,
GeologicTimeBoundary,
GeologicTimePeriod, GroupPersons, Habitat, Image, ImageAgents,
ImageCollectionObjects,
ImageLocalities, Journal, Loan, LoanAgents,
LoanPhysicalObject,
LoanReturnPhysicalObject, Locality,
LocalityCitation, Observation,
OtherIdentifier, Permit, Preparation, Project,
ProjectCollectionObjects, ReferenceWork, REPORTS, Shipment, Sound,
SoundEventStorage, Stratigraphy, TaxonCitation, TaxonName,
TaxonomicUnitType,
TaxonomyType.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Accession'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Accession'

tr.td: A user-visible identifier of the Accession. Typically an integer, but may include alphanumeric characters as prefix, suffix, and separators.

Status of Accession, e.g. 'In process', 'Complete', ...
validation message: List.

Source of Accession, e.g. 'Collecting', 'Gift', 'Bequest', ...
validation message: List.
Login name of user who last edited the record.
Link to Lookup table for Status.
Link to Lookup table for Type.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'AccessionAgents'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'AccessionAgents'

tr.td: Accession in which the Agent played a role.
AgentAdress of agent playing role in Accession.

Role the agent played in the accession process.
validation message: List.
Link to Lookup table for Role.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'AccessionAuthorizations'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'AccessionAuthorizations'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Address'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Address'

tr.td: Address as it should appear on mailing labels.

div.p: Information about people, groups, and organizations.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Agent'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Agent'

tr.td:
Discriminator between Organization(0), Person(1),Other(2), and Group(3).
Default value: 1

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'AgentAddress'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'AgentAddress'

tr.td:
0 for organization, 1 for person.
Default value: 1

Associated record in Address table.
Default value: Null

Associated record in Agent table.
Default value: Null

Associates Agent identified by AgentID (type Person) as a member of Agent identified by OrganizationID (type Organization).
Default value: Null
Agent's (person) job title at specified address and organization.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Authors'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Authors'

tr.td: the order of AgentID relative to other authors of reference.

div.p: Measurements and other attributes of BiologicalObjects.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BiologicalObjectAttributes'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BiologicalObjectAttributes'

tr.td: Link to Lookup table for Sex.
Link to Lookup table for Stage.

div.p: Information about relationships (Parent-Child, Host-Parasite, etc.) between BiologicalObjects.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BiologicalObjectRelation'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BiologicalObjectRelation'

div.p: Information about the valid types of relationships between BiologicalObjects. .

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BiologicalObjectRelationType'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BiologicalObjectRelationType'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Borrow'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Borrow'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BorrowAgents'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BorrowAgents'

tr.td: ID of borrow in which Agent played role.
Address/Organization from which agent participated in the borrow.

Role played by agent in borrow.
validation message: List.
Link to Lookup table for Role.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BorrowMaterial'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BorrowMaterial'

tr.td: ID of the Borrow containing the Prep.
Description of the material. 'e.g. Bufo bufo skull'.
Notes concerning the return of the material.
Notes concerning the receipt of the material.
Quantity resolved (Returned, Accessioned, Lost, Discarded, Destroyed, ...).

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BorrowReturnMaterial'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BorrowReturnMaterial'

div.p: Shipments of borrowed material to lenders.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BorrowShipments'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'BorrowShipments'

div.p: Information about catalog series within collections.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CatalogSeries'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CatalogSeries'

tr.td: Textual name for Catalog series. E.g. Main specimen collection.
Text Displayed with Catalog numbers. E.g. 'KU'.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CatalogSeriesDefinition'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CatalogSeriesDefinition'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectingEvent'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectingEvent'

tr.td: Station number or field number of the site where collecting event took place, A number or code recorded in field notes and/or written on field tags that identifies ALL material collected in a CollectingEvent.

The method used to obtain the biological object.
validation message: List*.
Date which collector recorded in field book, exactly as reported by the collector. Should indicate whether reported as range, season, month, etc.

Start time in military format.
Default value: -1

End time in military format.
Default value: -1
Original statement (literal quotation) of the location of the CollectingEvent as given by the Collector.

The name of the group that this record is visible to.
validation message: List.
Free text to record information that does not conform to structured fields, or to explain data recorded in those fields, particularly problematic interpretations of data given by collector(s).
Link to Lookup table for Method.
Link to Lookup table for GroupPermittedToView.

div.p: Information about collections - address, personnel, etc.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Collection'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Collection'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionObject'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionObject'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionObjectCatalog'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionObjectCatalog'

tr.td:
The catalog series that contains the object.
Default value: Null

The accession for the collection object.
Default value: Null

Person who cataloged the object.
Default value: Null

Date the object was cataloged.
Default value: Null
Information about the physical location of the object.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionObjectCitation'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionObjectCitation'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionObjectType'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionObjectType'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionTaxonomyTypes'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'CollectionTaxonomyTypes'

tr.td: Link to the Collection for which the mapping holds.
Link to CollectionObjectTypeID code for BiologicalObject.
Link to TaxonomyTypeID associated with the BiologicalObjectType specified above.

Date/Time the record was last modified.
Default value: Now()

Date/Time the record was created.
Default value: Now()
Login name of user who last modified the record.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Collectors'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Collectors'

tr.td: The CollectingEvent the agent participated in.
Link to Collector's record in Agent table.
The order of AgentID relative to Cother collectors for CollectingEventID.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'DATAVIEWS'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'DATAVIEWS'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Deaccession'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Deaccession'

tr.td: Name institution assigns to the deacession.
Link to Lookup table for Type.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'DeaccessionAgents'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'DeaccessionAgents'

tr.td:
Role agent played in deaccession.
validation message: List.
Link to Lookup table for Role.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'DeaccessionCollectionObject'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'DeaccessionCollectionObject'

tr.td: Number of specimens deaccessioned (necessary for lots).

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Determination'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Determination'

tr.td: Yes if the determination is considered the 'best' (maybe even one of the better).

id of the Person making the determination.
Default value: Null
The id of the taxon name.

Preparations can also be assigned determinations. Must a Preparation of BiologicalObjectID.
Default value: Null

Confidence of determination.
validation message: List*.

Method of determination.
validation message: List*.
Body part, or characteristic used as the basis of a determination.

Date/Time the record was created.
Default value: Now()

Date/Time the record was modified.
Default value: Now()
Link to Lookup table for TypeStatusName.
Link to Lookup table for Confidence.
Link to Lookup table for Method.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'DeterminationCitation'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'DeterminationCitation'

tr.td: ID of the publication citing the determination.

div.p: Information on incoming exchanges of botanical material.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ExchangeIn'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ExchangeIn'

tr.td: ID of Collection making the exchange.
AgentAddress ID of organization that sent material.
Agent ID of person recording the exchange.

div.p: Information on outgoing exchanges of botanical material.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ExchangeOut'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ExchangeOut'

tr.td: ID of Collection making the exchange.
AgentAddress ID of organization material was sent to.
Agent ID of person who recorded the exchange.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Geography'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Geography'

tr.td: Link to current equivalent if IsCurrent is 'No'.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'GeologicTimeBoundary'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'GeologicTimeBoundary'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'GeologicTimePeriod'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'GeologicTimePeriod'

tr.td: Numeric representation of Items rank in stratigraphic hierarchy.
Type of period; i.e. Era, Epoch, etc.
The system of stratigraphy the record is included in.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'GroupPersons'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'GroupPersons'

tr.td: AgentID of member (member must be of type Person).

div.p: Ecological data associated with collecting events.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Habitat'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Habitat'

tr.td: Link to TaxonName (Added primarily for insect collecting events).
Link to Lookup table for HabitatType.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Image'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Image'

div.p: Associates agents (as subject matter) with images.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ImageAgents'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ImageAgents'

div.p: Associates BiologicalObjects (as subject matter) with images.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ImageCollectionObjects'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ImageCollectionObjects'

div.p: Associates localities (as subject matter) with images.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ImageLocalities'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ImageLocalities'

tr.td: ID of locality depicted in image.

div.p: Information about journals involved in citations.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Journal'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Journal'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Loan'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Loan'

tr.td: ID of The department making the loan.
Date the loan is due for return (Same as original Due date unless loan period has been extended).
Date the loan was originally due.

Type of record: loan(0), Gift(1).
Default value: 0

The date the record was created.
Default value: Now()

The date the record was modified.
Default value: Now()
Login name of the user who last edited the record.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'LoanAgents'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'LoanAgents'

tr.td: ID of loan agent at AgentAddressID played a role in.

Role the agent played in the loan.
validation message: List.
Link to Lookup table for Role.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'LoanPhysicalObject'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'LoanPhysicalObject'

tr.td:
The total number of specimens loaned (necessary for lots).
Default value: 1
Description of loaned material (intended to be used for non-cataloged items, i.e. when PreparationID is null).
Number of specimens returned, deaccessioned or otherwise accounted for. (necessary for Lots).
Number of specimens returned. (necessary for Lots).

Date the record was created.
Default value: Now()

Date the record was modified.
Default value: Now()
Login name of the user last editing the record.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'LoanReturnPhysicalObject'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'LoanReturnPhysicalObject'

tr.td: Quantity of items returned (necessary for lots).
ID of associated (if present) DeaccessionPhysicalObject record.

Date the record was created.
Default value: Now()

Date the record was modified.
Default value: Now()
user ID of the person last editing the record.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Locality'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Locality'

tr.td: Link to Country, State, County, WaterBody, Island, IslandGroup, ... info.

The named place the locality is closest to.
validation message: Ouch.
Relation of the locality to the named place.

The full name of the locality.
validation message: Ouch.
The Range of a legal description.
The Township of a legal description.
The Section of a legal description.
The verbatim elevation including units as given in the field notes.

The minimum elevation in Meters.
Default value: Null

The maximum elevation in Meters.
Default value: Null

The method used to determine the elevation.
validation message: List.

The type of area described by the lat long data (Point,Line,Rectangle).
validation message: List.

Latitude of first point.
Default value: Null

Longitude of first point.
Default value: Null

Latitude of second point.
Default value: Null

Longitude of second point.
Default value: Null

the method used to determine the LatitudeLongitude.
validation message: List.

The name of the group that this record is visible to. (Default to public).
validation message: List.

Date the record was created.
Default value: Now()

Date the record was modified.
Default value: Now()
Name of the person last editing the record.
Link to Lookup table for ElevationMethod.
Link to Lookup table for LatLongType.
Link to Lookup table for LatLongMethod.
Link to Lookup table for GroupPermittedToView.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'LocalityCitation'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'LocalityCitation'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Observation'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Observation'

tr.td: The id of the biological object.

How the observation was made.
validation message: List*.
Link to Lookup table for ObservationMethod.

div.p: Associates current identifiers with previous or additional catalog numbers or other identifiers.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'OtherIdentifier'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'OtherIdentifier'

tr.td: ID of object identified by Identifier.

div.p: Information about permits from organizations or individuals.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Permit'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Permit'

tr.td:
Permit category - 'CITES', 'Migratory Bird Treaty Act', ...
validation message: List.
Link to Lookup table for Type.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Preparation'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Preparation'

tr.td:
The medium in which the preparation is stored or embedded.
validation message: List.

div.p: Information about projects that use or produce material in a collection.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Project'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Project'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ProjectCollectionObjects'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ProjectCollectionObjects'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ReferenceWork'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'ReferenceWork'

tr.td: Link to Journal containing the reference (if applicable).
Type of Reference (Book(0), Electronic Media(1), Paper(2), Technical Report(3), Thesis(4), Section in book(5)).
Number of pages or Page range for Journal articles.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'REPORTS'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'REPORTS'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Shipment'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Shipment'

tr.td: AgentAddressID of agent transporting the material.
AgentAddressID of agent material is shipped to.
AgentID of person approving/initiating the shipment.

Description of shipment. E.g. 'Hand-carried', 'Overnight', 'Air', 'Land', 'Sea', ...
validation message: List.
Link to Lookup table for ShipmentMethod.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Sound'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Sound'

div.p: Information about a SoundEvent's position (tape side, cue number, etc.) on recordings of the event.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'SoundEventStorage'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'SoundEventStorage'

tr.td: i.e. Tape side, tape counter start, tape counter end, ...

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Stratigraphy'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'Stratigraphy'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'TaxonCitation'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'TaxonCitation'

tr.td: The ID of reference work that cites the taxon name.
The ID of the taxon name.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'TaxonName'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'TaxonName'

tr.td: Link to the TaxonName record for the taxon's parent taxon.
Link to info about the type (Bird, Fish, Mammal, ...) of the taxon.
If not Accepted then a link to the TaxonName record for the accepted taxon, else null.
Link to info about the rank (Family, Genus Species...) of the taxon.
If the record has been imported from an Authority File then this field stores a unique ID assigned by the provider, else it is null.
The monomial name for the taxon (e.g. 'pipiens').
The full name of the taxon (e.g. 'Rana pipiens').
If the record has been imported then this field holds information about the authority file it was obtained from, else it is user-editable.

Minimum security level required to view the record.
validation message: List.
Link to Lookup table for GroupPermittedToView.

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'TaxonomicUnitType'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'TaxonomicUnitType'

table.summary: Attributes and indices of the entity 'TaxonomyType'

caption.strong: Attributes and indices of the entity 'TaxonomyType'

tr.td: 'Yes' unless the Structural info about the taxonomy (as stored in TaxonName.NodeNumber and .HighestChildNodeNumber) is out of date.

div.p:
Footnotes:The following abbreviations have been used in the tables:
R: It is required to enter data in this field.
I: The field is indexed to enable faster searching. Different types of indices are denoted by additional letters in parentheses: U= unique index, N= Null values are ignored in the index, M= the index contains more than one attribute. In the first column the names of attributes that are part of the primary key are
underlined .

Data types:
'Text (255)' indicates a text of varying length for which no specific design restrictions have been formulated. 255 characters should be read as a proposed technical maximum limit, that can be changed if required by the database management system. In contrast,
'Memo' is explicitly defined as text of unlimited length.
